thread.title: AR Rahman named Cultural Ambassador for Seychelles
thread.title_full: AR Rahman named Cultural Ambassador for Seychelles - The Times of India

author: timesofindia.indiatimes.com
title: AR Rahman named Cultural Ambassador for Seychelles
text:
Oscar-winning composer AR Rahman has been named the Cultural Ambassador for Seychelles. The music maestro has sent out his love and regard to the people and government of the foreign nation.
READ: AR Rahman to receive the Hridaynath Mangeshkar award on October 26
The composer, who has taken Indian music on a world tour with his sounds, shared the news with his fans and followers on Twitter.
For latest Music updates follow us on Twitter >>> @TOIEntertain
For the latest in Music news, like us on Facebook >>> TOIEntertain
A two-time Oscar winning composer, Rahman shared an image of the certificate, on the micro-blogging site.
"With love and regards to the people and government of Seychelles," he captioned the picture.
For more interesting Music news and pictures follow us on Pinterest>>> timesofindia
For latest Music updates follow us on G+ >>> The Times of India Entertainment
Listen to songs of AR Rahman on Gaana.com
Click here for more Bollywood videos
The certificate reads: "The Seychelles Ministry of Tourism and Culture proudly names AR
Rahman Cultural Ambassador for Seychelles in appreciation for the invaluable services contributed to enhance Seychelles's Art and Cultural development."
